name: Lightray Ragnarok
text: You can banish 1 Light monster from your GY: Special Summon this card, and for the rest of the turn, you can only Special Summon Light monsters. You can only Special Summon "Lightray Ragnarok" once per turn this way. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Lightray" monster from your Deck to your hand.
